titles.title: Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the first national elections in the Republic of India and commending the Government and people of India for maintaining a commitment to democracy for half a century.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 10/16/2002--Introduced. Commends the Government and people of India for a 50-year tradition of free and fair elections and the orderly transfer of political power.Reiterates congressional support for continued close ties between the United States and India, particularly in joint efforts to promote democracy.
